org.enhydra.shark.utilities.ldap

Class LDAPClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.enhydra.shark.utilities.ldap.LDAPClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LDAPClientInterface

    public class LDAPClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements LDAPClientInterface
    Connects to the LDAP server and gets wanted entries.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sasa Bojanic, Tanja Jovanovic

      • checkPassword

        public boolean checkPassword(java.lang.String username,
                    java.lang.String pwd)
        Connects to the LDAP server specified by LDAPOptions object, and checks given password.
        Specified by:
        checkPassword in interface LDAPClientInterface
        Parameters:
        username - User distinctive name.
        pwd - Password to check for the given user.
        Returns:
        true if password is OK.
